summary: This document is a press release from the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) regarding the death of Jeffrey Epstein, sent by an Assistant United States Attorney from the Southern District of New York. It appears to be an official notification or statement concerning the incident.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The subject of the press release, identified as having died at the Metropolitan Correctional Center.

events.title: MCC Press Release on Epstein Death
events.description: The Metropolitan Correctional Center issues a press release regarding the death of inmate Jeffrey Epstein.

locations: One St. Andrew's Plaza, New York, New York 10007
keyFacts: The document is a press release from the Metropolitan Correctional Center concerning Jeffrey Epstein's death.
It was sent by an Assistant United States Attorney from the Southern District of New York.
The release date is November 15, 2019, which is after Epstein's death in August 2019, suggesting it may be a follow-up or formal statement.
